00048 //! Struct OctreeLoc
00049 //
00050 struct OctreeLoc
00051 {
00052   double xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax, zmin, zmax;
00053   void construire(const OctreeLoc& loc, int  i);
00054   void construire(const OctreeLoc& loc, int  i,
00055                   double xmil, double ymil, double zmil);
00056   int direction(double x, double y, double z) const;
00057 };

00061 //
00062 // 
00063 // 
00064 // OctreeLoc OctreeRoot OctreeFloor
00065 //
00066 //! Classe Octree
00067 //
00068 class Octree
00069 {
00070 public :
00071   Octree():les_octrees(0), pere(0) {}
00072   virtual ~Octree();
00073   Octree(const Octree&):les_octrees(0), pere(0) {}
00074   Octree(int n, Octree* mon_pere, const ArrOfInt& val,
00075          const OctreeLoc& loc)
00076   {
00077     construire(n, val, loc, mon_pere);
00078   }
00079   virtual int rang_elem_loc(const OctreeLoc&, double x, double y=0, double z=0) const;
00080   virtual int rang_elem_depuis_loc(const OctreeLoc&, int prems, double x, double y=0, double z=0) const;
00081 
00082   virtual const Zone& zone() const;
00083   void construire(int, const ArrOfInt&, const OctreeLoc&, Octree* p=0);
00084   int niveau() const;
00085   virtual int taille() const;
00086   static int nombre_d_octrees();
00087   virtual Sortie& printOn(Sortie& is) const;
00088   virtual Entree& readOn(Entree& is);
00089 protected :
00090   void detruire();
00091   void ranger_elem_1D(ArrOfInt&, int , int, int, const DoubleTab&,
00092                       const IntTab&, ArrOfInt&, IntVects&,
00093                       double );
00094   void ranger_elem_2D(ArrOfInt&, int , int, int, const DoubleTab&,
00095                       const IntTab&,ArrOfInt&, IntVects&,
00096                       double ,double );
00097   void ranger_elem_3D(ArrOfInt&, int , int, int, const DoubleTab&,
00098                       const IntTab&,ArrOfInt&, IntVects&,
00099                       double, double, double);
00100   double get_epsilon() const;
00101   Octree** les_octrees;
00102   Octree* pere;
00103 
00104 private :
00105 };

00108 //
00109 // 
00110 // 
00111 // OctreeLoc Octree OctreeFloor
00112 //
00113 //! Classe OctreeRoot
00114 //
00115 class OctreeRoot :  public Objet_U, public Octree
00116 {
00117   Declare_instanciable_sans_constructeur(OctreeRoot);
00118 
00119 public :
00120   OctreeRoot():valid_(0) {}
00121   OctreeRoot(const Zone& z)
00122   {
00123     associer_Zone(z);
00124     construire();
00125   }
00126   OctreeRoot(const OctreeRoot& oc): Objet_U(oc),Octree(oc)
00127   {
00128     if(oc.construit())
00129       {
00130         associer_Zone(oc.zone());
00131         construire();
00132       }
00133     else
00134       valid_=0;
00135   }
00136   int rang_sommet(double x, double y=0, double z=0) const;
00137   int rang_arete(double x, double y=0, double z=0) const;
00138   int rang_elem(double x, double y=0, double z=0) const;
00139   int rang_elem_depuis(int prems, double x, double y=0, double z=0) const;
00140   int rang_sommet(const DoubleTab&, ArrOfInt&) const;
00141   int rang_arete(const DoubleTab&, ArrOfInt&) const;
00142   int rang_elem(const DoubleTab&, ArrOfInt&) const;
00143   int rang_elem_depuis(const DoubleTab&, const ArrOfInt&, ArrOfInt&) const;
00144   void rang_elems_sommet(ArrOfInt&, double x, double y=0, double z=0) const;
00145 
00146   const Zone& zone() const;
00147   void associer_Zone(const Zone&);
00148   void construire(int reel=0);
00149   int construit() const;
00150   void invalide();
00151   inline int reel() const;
00152 
00153 protected :
00154   REF(Zone) la_zone;
00155   OctreeLoc loc;
00156   int valid_;
00157   int reel_;
00158 };
00159 
00160 inline int OctreeRoot::reel() const
00161 {
00162   return reel_;
00163 }
